snippet: The Islanders agreed to terms with the restricted free agent forward Josh Bailey on a five-year, $16.5 million deal.
abstract: New York Islanders and restricted free agent forward Josh Bailey agree to a five-year contract worth $16.5 million.
lead_paragraph: The Islanders agreed to terms with the restricted free agent forward Josh Bailey on a five-year, $16.5 million deal.

headline.main: Islanders and Bailey Agree to Five-Year Deal
headline.print_headline: Islanders and Bailey Agree to Five-Year Deal
